Articles.Content: Hello you minercaft fans out there. I am inviting you to play our MC server. We have too little people on server so that why I posted this thread. IP is 185.4.149.35:25568. To be on our server, after you register you MUST say you where sent or invited by Aminjo16(my acc nick) and later when I am online say to me that you came. Server is bukkit And has towny plugin, protection stones, epic boss pvp arena, wildness and shop. Thanks for coming i make sure to check it .
